## Outcome
- What measurable outcome will this produce? (e.g., +CTR, faster loop, fewer tokens, clearer dashboard)

## One-bite Scope
- Single, shippable change in <60 minutes
- No external posting without explicit approval

## Plan (1-3 steps max)
- [ ] Step 1
- [ ] Step 2 (optional)

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Code merged to main
- [ ] Changelog updated (if user-facing)
- [ ] Added/updated logs or metrics

## Notes
- Risks, quick wins, follow-ups
